sn34.28-34:1.4: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco jhāyī samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.5: samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo hoti, na samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.6: neva samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo hoti, na ca samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo …
sn34.28-34:1.7: samādhismiṃ vuṭṭhānakusalo ca hoti samādhismiṃ kallitakusalo ca.
sn34.28-34:1.11: (Purimamūlakāni viya yāva catuttiṃsatimā vuṭṭhānamūlakasappāyakārīsuttā satta suttāni pūretabbāni. Vuṭṭhānamūlakaṃ.)
